PAGE.TITLE: VS Code
PAGE.CONTENT:
CLI
Print command line help
Code.exe --help
Print version
Code.exe --version
Wait for the files to be closed before returning
Code.exe --wait file1 file2
Open file at given position
Code.exe --wait file1:line
Code.exe --wait file1:line:column
Specify the directory that user data is kept in
--user-data-dir H:\Documents\tools\VSCode\myDataDir
Specify the directory where the extensions are installed
--extensions-dir H:\Documents\tools\VSCode\extensions
Show All Commands Show command palette
View: Toggle Problems Show/hide errors and warnings
View: Toggle Side Bar Visibility Show/hide left panel
View: Toggle Panel Show/hide bottom panel
View: Toggle Terminal Show/hide terminal
Toggle Tab Key Moves Focus Set/unset mode for changing focus with tab key
, Display keyboard shortcuts
Type the string definition of a shortcut (e.g. ctrl + n), to find where it is used.
Code: Show Release Notes Display the last release notes
Help: About Display versions of VS Code and its components
File
double left click on tab menubar
New Untitled File Open new empty editor
View: Show Explorer Show the file explorer
Collapse Folders in Explorer Collapse the folders in the file explorer
File: Open File… Open a file
File: Open Recent… Open a recent file
File: Reveal in File Explorer Open an OS file explorer with the file being selected
View: Quick Open Least Recently Used Editor in Group Navigate backward history of file
View: Quick Open Previous Recently Used Editor in Group Navigate forward history of file
Go to file… Go to file
,
File: Open Folder… Open folder
Save
, Save all
,
View: Keep Editor Keep the editor open
,
View: Pin Editor
View: Unpin Editor Pin/unpin the editor
,
Change Language Mode Set the editor language
View: Close Editor Close an editor
View: Reopen Closed Editor Reopen the last closed editor
,
View: Close All Editors in Group Close all editors in editor group
,
View: Close Saved Editors in Group Close saved editors in editor group
,
View: Close All Editors Close all editors
,
Workspaces: Close Workspace Close workspace
Close folder
Change File Encoding Reload the file with another encoding
File: Copy Path of Active File Copy the full path of the file in the clipboard
,
workbench.action.files.copyPathOfActiveFile Copy path of file in active editor
Open new terminal Open a command window of the operating system
Display
Toggle Word Wrap Toggle word wrap
View: Toggle Render Whitespace Display/undisplay space characters
View: Toggle Editor Sticky Scroll Toggle sticky scroll
Toggle full screen
, Toggle the zen mode
Zoom in
Zoom out
Reset zoom
editor.inlayHints.enabled Display/undisplay the inline parameter hints
editor.guides.indentation Display/undisplay the indentation guides (vertical lines)
Folding
Fold Fold
Unfold Unfold
,
Fold All Fold all
,
Unfold All Unfold all
,
Fold Level 1 Fold level 1
,
Fold Level 2 Fold level 2
,
Fold Level 3 Fold level 3
,
Fold Level 4 Fold level 4
,
Fold Level 5 Fold level 5
,
Fold Level 6 Fold level 6
,
Fold Level 7 Fold level 7
,
Fold All Regions Fold all regions
A region is between a comment containing #region Region Name and a comment containing #endregion
Selection
Expand Line Selection Add the next line to the selection
Expand Selection Expand Selection (e.g. select the containing node in XML)
Shrink Selection Shrink Selection
Multi-selection
Add Cursor Above Add cursor on previous line
Add Cursor Below Add cursor on next line
left click Add cursor
Change All Occurrences Select all the instances of the current selection
Select All Occurrences of Find Match Select all the instances of the current selection
Add Selection to Next Find Match Add the next found match to the current selection
,
Move Selection to Next Find Match Unselect the last selection and add the next found match the current selection
Cursor Undo Undo the last cursor state change
Useful to undo cancel the last or the last .
Cursor Redo Redo the previously undone cursor state change
Go to previous edit location
Go to next edit location
Sort Lines Ascending Sort lines in increasing order
Sort Lines Descending Sort lines in decreasing order
Delete Duplicate Lines Delete duplicate lines
Move line up
Move line down
Copy line up
Copy line down
,
Add Line Comment Comment the selected lines
,
Remove Line Comment Uncomment the selected lines
Toggle Line Comment Toggle the line comment on the selected lines
Toggle Block Comment Toggle the block comment on the selected lines
Format Document Reformat the whole document
Trigger Suggest Display the suggestion popup
Go to Next Problem (Error, Warning, Info) Go to next problem
Go to Next Problem in File (Error, Warning, Info) Go to next problem
Go to Previous Problem (Error, Warning, Info) Go to previous problem
Go to Previous Problem in File (Error, Warning, Info) Go to previous problem
Navigation
Next editor
Previous editor
, Open active file in new window
New Window New window
Close Window Close the window
View: Split Editor Split editor vertically
, Split editor horizontally
View: Move Editor into Next Group Move editor into next group
View: Move Editor into Previous Group Move editor into previous group
Search/replace
SCrollLineDown Scroll down by one line
SCrollLineUp Scroll up by one line
View: Toggle Locked Scrolling Across Editors Lock the scrolling of editors
Display go to line dialog
Go to definition of the symbol where is the cursor
Find Search
Use the regexp \xa0 to find non breaking spaces
Find next
Replace
Groups are defined by ( and ).
Use $0 to insert the full string, $1 the first group… $$ to insert $.
To uppercase a group, use \U$1.
\u and \l upper/lowercase a single character, \U and \L upper/lowercase the rest of the matching group.
The modifiers can also be stacked:, \u\u\u$1 uppercase the first three characters of the group, \l\U$1 lowercase the first character and uppercase the rest.
Search: Find in Files Search in files
Search: Focus Next Search Result Select next search match
Search: Focus Previous Search Result Select previous search match
Search: Replace in Files Replace in files
Go to symbol in Editor… Go to a symbol definition in the current editor
Go to symbol in Workspace… Go to a symbol definition in the workspace
Comparison of two files
Using the UI
Right click on the first file and select Select for Compare
Right click on the second file and select Select for Compare with Selected
Using the CLI
Code.exe --diff file1 file2
Using commands
File: Compare Active File With…
File: Compare New Untitled Text Files: create a comparison between two empty editable editors
Compare: Toggle Inline View Toggle inline view
Go to Next Change Go to next change
Go to Previous Change Go to previous change
Show Next Change Show next change
Go to Previous Change Show previous change
Transform to Lowercase Convert selection to lowercase
Transform to Uppercase Convert selection to uppercase
Transform to Title Case Convert selection to titlecase
Convert Indentation to Spaces Reindent with spaces
Convert Indentation to Tabs Reindent with tabs
Peek definition
Find all references
Peek all references
Show/hide source code management
GitLens changes it to ,
Show launch and debug
Tasks: Run Build Task Display the selector to run a build task
Run: Start Without Debugging Launch the program
Debug: Start Debugging Launch the program in debug mode
Debug: Continue Continue the program in debug mode
Debug: Stop Stop the program in debug mode
Debug: Restart Relaunch the program in debug mode
Customisation
Show manage extensions
Preferences: Open Settings (UI) Display settings
Preferences: Open Worspace Settings (JSON) Open <workspace>/.vscode/settings.json
Preferences: Open User Setting (JSON) If there is a profile: open <user-data-dir>/User/profiles/<profile-id>/settings.json
otherwise: open <user-data-dir>/User/settings.json
Preferences: Open Application Settings (JSON) If there is a profile: open <user-data-dir>/User/settings.json
otherwise: the command is unavailable
Preferences: Open Default Settings (JSON) Open defaultSettings.json (where is this file?)
,
FilePreferencesColor Theme Display the theme picker (navigate with /, the theme is interactively applied)
Emmet
Emmet: Balance (outward) Select the outer node scope
Emmet: Balance (inward) Select the inner node scope
Markdown
Markdown: Open Preview Show Markdown preview
,
Markdown: Open Preview to the Side Show Markdown preview in an editor on the side
Markdown: Show Source Open an editor with the source of the Markdown preview currently displayed
Markdown: Find File References Find the references to the Markdown file currently displayed
To set Git bash as the default shell, define in settings.json: "terminal.integrated.profiles.windows": {
"PowerShell": {
"source": "PowerShell",
"icon": "terminal-powershell"
},
"Command Prompt": {
"path": [
"${env:windir}\\Sysnative\\cmd.exe",
"${env:windir}\\System32\\cmd.exe"
],
"args": [],
"icon": "terminal-cmd"
},
"Git Bash": {
"path": "G:\\Documents\\tools\\Git\\2.46.0\\bin\\bash.exe"
}
},
"terminal.integrated.defaultProfile.windows": "Git Bash"
Used extensions
XMLhttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=redhat.vscode-xml
enHTML
Code Spell Checkerhttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=streetsidesoftware.code-spell-checker
enHTML
Pylancehttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-python.vscode-pylance
enHTML
Pythonhttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-python.python
enHTML
to set the virtual environment to use, run Python: Select Interpreter.
to define the default virtual environment to use, add "python.envFile": "${workspaceFolder}/.venv" in settings.json.
to enable type checking, set python.analysis.typeCheckingMode to basic or strict.
Codeiumhttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Codeium.codeium
enHTML
Codeium: Provide Authentication Token Declare the authentication token
Codeium: Command Open command
Cancel command
Accept diff
Reject diff
Follow-up diff
Codeium: Toggle Autocomplete for Current Language Toggle autocomplete for current language
Trigger line suggestion
Show next completion
Show previous completion
Codeium: Open Chat Display the chat
Codeium: Focus on Chat View Display and focus on the chat
codeium.enableCodeLens Toggle the display of inline action buttons
GitLenshttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=eamodio.gitlens
enHTML (dochttps://help.gitkraken.com/gitlens/gitlens-home/
enHTML)
,
GitLens: Toggle File Blame Toggle the display (on the left) of the blaming for each code line
GitLens: Toggle Line Blame Toggle the display (at the right of the file line) of the blaming for the current line
,
GitLens: Toggle Code Lens Toggle the display of inlined code blaming
GitLens: Toggle File Heatmap Toggle the display of the heatmap
Dockerhttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ms-azuretools.vscode-docker
enHTML
Docker Containers: Attach Shell Open a shell in a running container
Shades of Purplehttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=ahmadawais.shades-of-purple
enHTML
Extensions not used anymore
GitLab Workflowhttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=GitLab.gitlab-workflow
enHTML
gitlab.aiAssistedCodeSuggestions.enabled Toggle code completion
Extension Pack for Javahttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=vscjava.vscode-java-pack
enHTML
Java: Create Java Project… Launch a wizard to create a Java project
Other extensions
Debugger for Chromehttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=msjsdiag.debugger-for-chrome
enHTML
Java Platform Supporthttps://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=Oracle.oracle-java
